channel.title: Donating Rank?
channel.description: Well, Im Trying To Figure Out How To Make A Donating Rank, Like i Got The Pic In my Client For The rank, But How Do i Make It So someone will have a certian rank and it will show that symbol??

item.title: Donating Rank?

item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

Well, you can’t exactly do that with a non-renamed client, get a refactored one and it will be 10X easier.

Read full topic

item.title: Donating Rank?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“moparwha, post:3, topic:250847”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=330933.msg2584387#msg2584387 date=1229397199]
It takes a while to do.
Look through the client and look at what it does for the mod and admin crowns.
[/quote]
No just do the custom admin/mod crown tutorial and add your sprite like

if(donator = 1)
donator_crown[/quote]
Which would lead him to do the exact same thing as I just said.

Read full topic
